name: The Map of Human Ideas
tagline: Discover where the worldâ€™s greatest ideas were born
description: Ever wondered where the worldâ€™s biggest ideas came from? The Map of Human Ideas visualizes over 250 discoveries, philosophies, and inventions across centuries. Each point on the map marks the origin of an idea that changed our collective story. Built as a side project to celebrate curiosity and creativity.

name: Chatter
tagline: Discover which reddit investors make it big â€” and how often
description: Search any stock ticker and discover what Reddit is saying. See which redditors get it right â€” and how often. Keep track of the posts you like the most and view their performance over time. Currently using data from r/wallstreetbets only, but planning to increase data sources in the future. Completely free to use!

name: JDoodle.ai
tagline: Vibe app builder with free bug fixes, db and PAYG credits
description: From the team behind JDoodle IDE (20M users served). Now bringing AI-powered full stack app building to everyone with a built-in database, hosting, free automatic bug fixing (no credits charged), and simple pay-as-you-go credits.

name: Customer Feedback Portal for Jira
tagline: Build what matters, with customer feedback in Jira
description: Make your Jira roadmaps two-way. Publish updates and ideas, collect feedback from customers and stakeholders, and watch every response flow straight back into Jira. No extra tools, no silos.

name: Noro ADHD Planner
tagline: Turn a briandump and wordvomit into a structured plan
description: Noro is the AI-powered ADHD planner that turns messy voice dumps into clean, structured todos with automatic time estimates and subtasks. Built for neurodivergent minds that struggle with time blindness and task initiation, and follow-through.

name: WordFlippin
tagline: Flip new words into lasting knowledge daily!!!
description: Master vocabulary with AI-powered spaced repetition. WordFlippin uses science-backed learning techniques to ensure every new word sticks permanently. Learn smarter, remember longer, and expand your vocab with confidence. Your words. Your pace. Real results.

name: Scaloom
tagline: The AI Agent That Makes Reddit Trust You
description: Scaloom is the AI agent that makes Reddit trust you. ðŸ¤– It helps founders and marketers build genuine credibility before promoting their products. Scaloom warms up accounts, earns karma through authentic engagement, finds friendly subreddits, and replies naturally. so you can grow on Reddit without spam, bans, or stress. Start promoting peacefully.

name: Astrolid
tagline: Because progress shouldn't be difficult
description: Astrolid is a project management tool that helps makers, creators and founders achieve their objectives faster by tying each task to a goal, and helping people feel the momentum and progress at every step. We show you how much each task makes you progress, unlocking productivity opportunities, and reducing unnecessary work. Most project management tools suck, let me show you why Astrolid doesn't! Check astrolid.com

name: Epismo: Kickoff Agent
tagline: Build your human-AI team. Assign the right AI to each task.
description: AI can do a lot, but knowing how to collaborate with it has become a skill in itself. Kickoff Agent makes that collaboration automatic. Simply describe what you want to achieve, and it tells which AI handles each task, or what should be done by yourself. It also provides ready-to-use prompts for every step!

name: Your Shoe Smells-Map for stinky gyms
tagline: Crowdsourced website for rating bouldering gym's smelliness
description: Find and rate the climbing/bouldering gyms nearby. Discover gyms, vote on smelliness, difficulty, parking, utility, and more. You can ask: "Which gym is the most smelly one?", "Where is the hardest gym?", or "Is there a moonboard/Kilterboard?", "Is there a sauna in this place?" You will get: An interactive climbing map tailored for you!

name: ClaudeSkillsHQ
tagline: One command. instant skills.
description: Run one command. Get instant access to 90+ verified Claude skills. No GitHub. No manual setup. Professional marketplace with native MCP integration.

name: Prompt Generator
tagline: Prompt generator
description: AI Prompt Generator helps you create perfect prompts for any purpose â€” from images and videos to research, debates, and ideas. Easily generate YouTube scripts, titles, and descriptions, or use the Universal mode for any creative or professional task. One tool for all your AI prompt needs.

name: AntreprendÃ¸r
tagline: The AI powered Operating System for founders
description: Antreprendor is Jarvis for Solo Founders. - Email Intelligence : Get Summary of your day and update action items. - Projekts: Build Projects with AI Action items + Deadline. - Calendar Intelligence: Let Jarvis take care of your time. - Favor: Ask Favors from new founders circle.

name: Teda.dev - AI app builder
tagline: Generates web applications that don't need a server to run
description: Platforms like Lovable and Bolt are trying to do what Teda does, but they make it unnecessarily complex. They force heavy frameworks and serverside logic on simple apps. But simple ideas should be simple to build. You don't need a complex server to record your child's growth. You don't need a heavy database to build a fitness app. You don't need a complex framework to build a portfolio. Teda skips the performance and goes straight to generating superior results and better UI every single time.

name: KineTools
tagline: Free Online Design & Developer Tools
description: KineTools - Discover 20+ free online tools for designers and developers. Generate colors, gradients, shadows, and more. Boost your workflow with instant, browser-based ai-powered utilities.

name: Akii AI Visibility Score
tagline: See how AI models understand and rank your brand - 100% free
description: Akii AI Visibility Score is the first free tool that reveals how top AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Perplexity see your brand. In under 2 minutes, it scans your website across Recognition, Understanding, Content Coverage, and Sentiment to deliver an actionable report. No signup, instant results, fully GDPR-compliant. Built for marketers, agencies, and founders who know AI is the new search engine and visibility is the new authority.

name: Style Match by Thumblify
tagline: Create thumbnails in the style you love
description: ThumblifyAI Style Match lets you create thumbnails in any YouTube thumbnail styles you love. Upload a thumbnail style, add your prompt, and create personalized thumbnails in seconds. It helps you match the vibe, colors, and layout from any thumbnail you like. You can take inspiration from your favorite creators and turn it into your own unique style. No design skills needed. Just upload, describe, and create.

name: is-a.software
tagline: Free subdomains for developers to use in their projects
description: Get your freeis-a.software subdomain for developers. Perfect for side projects, demos, portfolios, and showcasing your work. Easy DNS management

name: Devpilot
tagline: The AI co-pilot for your entire development lifecycle.
description: Devpilot is your new AI co-engineer, designed to take you from a single idea to a fully deployed, full-stack application. Stop wrestling with boilerplate, configuration files, and complex API integrations. Devpilot handles the entire workflow, acting as an autonomous agent that understands your product goals. Autonomous App Generation: Describe your app in plain English, and watch Devpilot build the React/Vite frontend and connect a real database (e.g., Supabase, Firebase) automatically.

name: Buildsheet
tagline: Create beautiful cheatsheets
description: A visual cheatsheet builder that helps you turn scattered notes into structured masterpieces. Think Notion + LaTeX + Markdown + Charts, all in one clean, fast tool âš¡
